name: SMC Kobah Pro Adze Ice Tool
description: Travel over snowy mountain terrain with confidence, this hybrid axe has a slight curve to so you won't bash your knuckles when swinging in steeper snow or ice. The pick has a positive-clearance tip and a classic profile should you need to self-arrest. The GripLock hand rest can be lowered for steep sections, or raised to be plungeable in soft snow.Asymmetric angled shaft for ergonomic handling and use in technical terrain.Chromoly steel Glacier pick and adze for self-arrest and all-mountain travel.Machined grip has a non-slip texture.Interchangeable design lets you change picks and accessories to suit your terrain.Adjustable pommel for switching up your hand position.Chromoly steel spike has a clippable hole.
